body_html:
I could reproduce this with CUDA 8 with cudnn 6 and I've verified that with CUDA9 + cudnn7, the issue is gone. I think this is a cudnn bug, please refer to: #13869 (comment)

Current OSS build from source as well as pip package for nightly (and 1.5 once it comes out) is CUDA9 + cudnn7, so expect this issue to be gone in these versions. For v1.4, it still uses CUDA8+cudnn6, so unfortunately, the bug will still exists if you use any version < v1.5.
